data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Phradis Foerster (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae) from the Neotropical Region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I., Bordera, Santiago (2012): First record of the genus Phradis Foerster (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae) from the Neotropical Region. ZooKeys 169: 31-38, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.169.2333, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.169.2333
